content.html: A friend of mine has put together a project to help the folks in her homeland of Ukraine. If you‚Äôre a yoga teacher or student, check out yoga4ukraine.com. The goal is to find 1000 yoga teachers around the world to donate the proceeds of one class by 12/31.

content.html: Well, we‚Äôve had a busy weekend. We put a deposit down on a fully loaded Chevy Bolt EUV, and sold our gas-guzzler. (The CarMax selling process was a breeze!) We‚Äôre now an electric-vehicle-only family, and it feels great!

content.html: Want to read: The Upcycle by William McDonough üìö Just added this to my queue after watching this video where McDonough talks about the philosophy and design thinking behind the book. He has a really inspiring and motivating take on designing for sustainability. In short, it‚Äôs: Why is getting to zero (waste, carbon, etc.) our goal? We can do better.

content.html: Went to the Seattle Kraken‚Äôs first home game last night at Climate Pledge Arena. What a great facility! A win would have been nice, but it was still a great game and an electric atmosphere. Looking forward to the rest of the season.
